Literature.Title: Polydim-I antimicrobial activity against MDR bacteria and its model membrane interaction.
Literature.Author: Rangel M, Castro FFDS, Mota-Lima LD, Clissa PB, Martins DB, Cabrera MPDS, Mortari MR

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC50=4.1µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=400µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=73.2µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=400µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC50=50.7µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>400µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC50=>400µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>400µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC50=84µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>400µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MR(90-100% Inhibition=1µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis VR(90-100% Inhibition=1µg/ml),Escherichia coli ESBL (90-100% Inhibition=1µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(90-100% Inhibition=1µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(90-100% Inhibition=1µg/ml),Acinetobacter sp.(90-100% Inhibition=5µg/ml)
